answers.answer: He's a fake. There is NO cure for diabetes!

There have been several posts regarding this "Dr. Tony Almedia" promoting his website.As WaveRider stated, this individual is a fake.This disturbs me because posts such as yours promoting this nincompoop cause people to defer treatment by a legitimate M.D. until there is irreversible damage to the body.

question: I recd. one mail regarding permanent cure of diabetics and formula is well examined by Dr. Tony Almeida. But when I tried it. As per written in the mail preparation formula. It is not possible.  In 5 cup of water, we boiled the composition for 10 minutes. It prepared like 'Dalia" or Khichri". How we can use it ,please explain.
title: permanent cure of diabetics
